subtitles.goals: Manage your long-term goals for each life category
subtitles.tasks: Set your tasks for today before your morning deadline
subtitles.progress: Track your progress and completion rates across all life areas
subtitles.settings: Manage your account and application preferences
subtitles.dashboard: Track your daily progress across all life areas

quotes.1: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
quotes.3: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.4: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.5: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
quotes.6: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.7: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.8: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.9: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.10: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.11: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
quotes.12: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
quotes.13: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.14: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
quotes.15: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
quotes.16: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
quotes.17: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
quotes.18: The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
quotes.20: Don't stop when you're tired. Stop when you're done.
quotes.21: Wake up with determination. Go to bed with satisfaction.
quotes.22: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
quotes.24: It's going to be hard, but hard does not mean impossible.
quotes.25: Don't wait for opportunity. Create it.
quotes.26: Sometimes we're tested not to show our weaknesses, but to discover our strengths.
quotes.27: The key to success is to focus on goals, not obstacles.
quotes.28: Dream it. Believe it. Build it.
quotes.29: Small steps every day lead to big results.
quotes.30: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
quotes.31: Commit to what happens rather than how it happens.
quotes.32: Commit to achieving predetermined results rather than clinging to routines.
quotes.33: Be willing to challenge any difficulty.
quotes.34: Be willing to shift mindset and correct actions.
quotes.35: Objective facts are the ultimate authority.
quotes.37: Clear vision and goals, with focus on action plans.
quotes.38: Act with urgency rather than desperation.
quotes.39: Details, details, details and a complete plan.
quotes.40: You are rigorous, disciplined, and persevering.
quotes.41: Fervent desire, firm belief, effective action, iron will.
quotes.42: Life is a journey of inspiration and calling.
quotes.43: Enrolment: Through interaction, inspire others to see possibilities and take action.
quotes.44: CNA spirit purpose: Inspire calling, contribute to creating a workable world, achieve self, achieve others, achieve society.
quotes.45: The key to success is to focus on goals, not obstacles.
quotes.46: Highest level of enrolment: Inspire others to enhance life value and take action.
quotes.47: CNA spirit purpose: Inspire people to commit, live out life positions, create extraordinary successful lives, pursue excellence, continuously improve, and move toward life vision.

preferences.deadlines_description: Set your preferred deadlines for morning and evening tasks.
preferences.morning_deadline_hint: e.g., 09:00 AM. Tasks due before this time are considered morning tasks.
preferences.evening_deadline_hint: e.g., 10:00 PM. Tasks due before this time are considered evening tasks.

about.title: About LOS
about.subtitle: Your Life Organization System, Maximized.
about.what_is_description: LOS is a comprehensive tool designed to help you organize your life, manage tasks, set goals, and track your progress effectively. It combines powerful features with a user-friendly interface to enhance your productivity and well-being.
about.step1: Set clear, achievable goals in the 'Goals' section.
about.step2: Break down your goals into manageable tasks in the 'Tasks' section.
about.step3: Update your task status and monitor your overall progress in 'Progress'.
about.step4: Customize your experience in the 'Settings' page.
